attributes.review:
I was SOOOOO excited to download this app. But there is so much wrong with it! First off, it took about 4 days for the app to fully download, I thought it was strange but I decided to ignore it. ✨🧚🏾‍♀️🤩Anything for Trump 🤩🧚🏾‍♀️✨. Once it fully downloaded I noticed my phone was slowing down and everything was becoming so laggy. Also my phone began emitting this strange orange light and a soft warbling sound. But yet again I ignored it bc... 🧚🏾‍♀️🤩Anything for Trump 🤩🧚🏾‍♀️✨. 

Suddenly I began noticing trump everywhere; in my bathroom, on my tv, in my fridge. I also noticed my vision was slowly turning orange. I was becoming a bit scared but again I ignored it because... 🧚🏾‍♀️🤩Anything for Trump 🤩🧚🏾‍♀️✨. On the 6th day I had this app, I looked in the mirror and realize that my lovely dark brown skin was turning orange. My face was beginning to sag and my 4c hair was turning into a strange blonde thing— almost like a horribly done wig. This time I was really getting scared, but I kept it because... 🧚🏾‍♀️🤩Anything for Trump 🤩🧚🏾‍♀️✨. 

My personality then began to change. I began getting extremely angry at every little thing. My ego grew 20x bigger as my hands shrank and the basic morals and values every person has, began to vanish. I was freaking out. Not only did I now look like Trump, I was thinking like trump!! 

I did some research online and came across a study done by The great scientist Ivanka Trump. Apparently I was becoming trumpified. Trumpification is the process in which a person becomes brainwashed and begins to eat, breathe, and sleep Trump. They slowly begin turning into trump without realizing it. Sometimes the change is physical but it is mostly mental. In my case, mine was both mental and physical. 

I began frantically searching for a cure since the trumpification process becomes permanent after a week and a half. Thankfully the other great scientist William Barr had figured out a cure, Trump rejecting you or social media!! Specifically Instagram and Tik Tok. Oh and deleting the app. After I figured that out I quickly grabbed my phone, after all I had couple of days before I become a mindless minion. I deleted Trump 2020 and spent hours and hours on Instagram and Tik tok. 

After A few days I came back to my senses! I am so grateful from Tik Tok and Insta, otherwise I’d be a brainless trump zombie. But then I heard about what that Oompa Loompa is wanting to do to Tik Tok. He wants to ban it!?? Well I have a message for you Oompa Loompa Trump

You wanna ban tik tok Trump? Then we coming for your dumb app and your  stupid presidency. We don’t want your racist, xenophobic, islamophobic, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, misogynistic, nasty orange clown ass in office. You make me sick to me stomach 🤢🤢🤢.F you, your supporters, and your app. WE DON’T WANT YOU ANYMORE!!!! NO TRUMP 2020!!!! GEN Z PICK UP YOUR PHONES, LET’S DO THIS!!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app literally took 3 hours to download and when it did it took up a whole bunch of space, forcing me to delete other apps just so this one could stay.The details literally state that it looks at your location and lowers your battery even when you’re not using it which leads me to believe that it also steals information.I will be deleting this app once I finish writing this review not only because of my suspicion but also because it is very glitchy and broken.I have also been getting nightmares from this app nonstop and it also gave me sleep paralysis and other side effects.I have been getting help but this app is something else and not in a good way.I hope it gets taken down so no one else experiences what I went through.

They hacked my Instagram account, my Facebook account, my Snapchat account, my messenger account, my YouTube account, and my twitter account and they tracked my phone’s location without me knowing, this app should get deleted🤬period.
